content:
Something to think about:

We might want to have some focused sessions at the Rust All Hands in Berlin this February. This time, I'd hope we can do a better job of having specific questions prepared in advance.
all-hands in Berlin this Feb? first time I hear about that^^
oh dear. Yes, that is the plan. I was hoping today to get organized notifying people who might not otherwise have heard. Consider yourself notified. =)
okay :D not very actionable though without details, like, uh, the actual dates :)
i need to make sure i don't sprain my ankle the day before this one...
